decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game by using a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan while ramping up its own mana production with cards like Lotus Cobra and Oracle of Mul Daya. Frost Titan provides a strong finisher while Goblin Ruinblaster disrupts the opponent's mana base. The deck includes some landfall synergy with cards like Explore and Raging Ravine to provide additional advantage.

This deck focuses on aggressively ramping up mana and consistently playing powerful creatures, utilizing Fauna Shaman to search for key cards like Vengevine and Frost Titan. With a mix of mana dorks like Birds of Paradise and efficient threats like Jace, the Mind Sculptor, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with high-powered creatures and disruptive spells. The inclusion of cards like Avenger of Zendikar and Acidic Slime provide additional value and answers to opposing threats, giving the deck versatility in different matchups.

Utilizing a mix of counterspells, removal, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to maintain control of the game by disrupting opponent's plans and generating card advantage with cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Sea Gate Oracle. The deck seeks to stabilize the board with creatures like Abyssal Persecutor and Grave Titan while utilizing cards like Everflowing Chalice and Mimic Vat for additional value. The mana base allows for flexibility while the inclusion of Tectonic Edge provides additional disruption against opponent's lands. Overall, the deck is focused on controlling the game and out-valuing opponents.

This deck focuses on quickly building up a strong board presence by utilizing low-cost vampire creatures with abilities that benefit from sacrificing creatures. By combining cards like Blade of the Bloodchief and Bloodghast with sacrifice outlets like Bloodthrone Vampire and Viscera Seer, the deck can generate a lot of value and pressure opponents early in the game. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Vendetta to control the board and keep the pressure on. Overall, this Aggro-Vampire deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a quick and aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Goblin Bushwhacker to swarm the board with creatures and deal quick damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast for additional direct damage, while Mox Opal provides mana acceleration. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, efficient aggro strategy, utilizing cards like Goblin Guide and Goblin Chieftain to buff and support the Goblin tribe. Additionally, cards like Molten-Tail Masticore provide additional threats and options for closing out games quickly.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly produce a large number of goblin tokens using cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Goblin Bushwhacker, and then buff them with cards like Goblin Chieftain to deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent. The deck also includes burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Bolt to take out any potential blockers or finish off the opponent. The low mana curve and aggressive playstyle make it an effective Aggro deck that aims to overwhelm the opponent with its fast and powerful creatures.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using Elves as the main creature type. By ramping up mana quickly with cards like Joraga Treespeaker and Llanowar Elves, the deck aims to play powerful Elf creatures like Elvish Archdruid and Ezuri, Renegade Leader to buff the team and create a threatening board presence. The inclusion of cards like Eldrazi Monument and Joraga Warcaller provide additional ways to pump up the Elves and push for a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board and slow down the opponent's plays using counterspells like Mana Leak and Negate. The deck utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Gideon Jura to generate card advantage and maintain control. Luminarch Ascension and Frost Titan provide additional threats and disruption. Removal spells like Condemn and Day of Judgment help keep the board clear, while card draw from Jace Beleren and Preordain ensure consistency. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win through incremental advantage and powerful finishers.

The deck focuses on quickly developing the board by playing landfall creatures and using various spells to deal direct damage to the opponent. It also includes equipment like Sword of Body and Mind to provide additional threats and evasion. The synergy between landfall triggers and aggressive creatures allows for early game pressure and the ability to close out games quickly. The inclusion of cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Squadron Hawk provides card advantage and consistency to keep the aggression going. The overall strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Goblin creatures. By using cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Goblin Bushwhacker, the deck can flood the board with creatures and pump them up with Goblin Chieftain. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast to finish off opponents or clear the way for attacks. It aims to win the game by quickly dealing damage and maintaining pressure on the opponent. The artifacts included can also provide additional benefits and synergies with the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with low-cost, aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Goblin Guide, Goblin Chieftain, and Goblin Bushwhacker alongside efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning, it aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Additionally, cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Panic Spellbomb can provide added value by creating tokens or drawing cards. By utilizing a fast and aggressive strategy, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent and win the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures like Molten-Tail Masticore, Goblin Guide, and Kargan Dragonlord. Using efficient burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Bolt, along with powerful planeswalkers like Koth of the Hammer, the deck aims to steadily reduce the opponent's life total while maintaining board control. With a low mana curve and a focus on quick damage, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main strategy of this deck is to establish early control over the game by using counterspells and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's plans while ramping up mana with cards like Lotus Cobra and Oracle of Mul Daya. Once the control is established, the deck aims to take over the game with powerful threats like Frost Titan and Avenger of Zendikar. Cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor provide card advantage and allow for further control of the game. Overall, this deck focuses on controlling the board and ultimately winning through powerful late game threats.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. It aims to ramp up its mana quickly with cards like Lotus Cobra and Oracle of Mul Daya, allowing for explosive plays like casting Avenger of Zendikar or Rite of Replication. Frost Titan provides a strong defensive option while also applying pressure on the opponent. The deck also utilizes landfall triggers and card draw to maintain advantage and outvalue the opponent. With a mix of efficient removal, counterspells, and resilient threats, this deck aims to dominate the game through superior card advantage and control.

This deck focuses on using mana ramp and control spells to dominate the game, taking advantage of powerful creatures like Frost Titan and Avenger of Zendikar. The goal is to establish board control with counter spells like Mana Leak and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, while also utilizing cards like Lotus Cobra and Explore to ramp up mana quickly. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation with Preordain and Oracle of Mul Daya to ensure consistency and efficiency in its gameplay.

The deck focuses on utilizing a variety of control elements, such as removal spells, counterspells, and powerful planeswalkers, to disrupt and outvalue the opponent. With a mix of creature removal, card draw, counterspells, and threats, the deck aims to control the game's pace and win the long game. The goal is to establish a dominant position on the board, while retaining card advantage and resources to outlast and outplay the opponent. By managing resources efficiently and establishing board control, the deck aims to grind out incremental advantages and secure victory through attrition.
